mapper.select: SELECT s.sku,v.uid vendorUid FROM omc.dbo.Master_Vendor_Inventory mvi INNER JOIN mmc.product.family fa ON mvi.ProductID = fa.productId INNER JOIN mmc.product.finish f ON mvi.Finish = f.finish INNER JOIN mmc.dbo.Manufacturer m ON m.Name = mvi.manufacturer INNER JOIN mmc.product.product p ON p.finishId = f.id AND p.familyId = fa.id INNER JOIN mmc.product.upcSku u ON p.uniqueId = u.uniqueId INNER JOIN mmc.product.sku s ON u.skuId = s.id INNER JOIN omc.dbo.vendor v ON mvi.Vendor = v.vendorid WHERE v.uid = #{vendorUid} AND p.statusId = 6
